Articles.Content:
hey guys, i had the game for about a month so far and all i gotta say is WTF!!!! i can't put this game down lol. i played untill 8am and i missed my college english class. this is not the first time but i gotta say i love this game. anyways i told all my friends about this game and they love it too. so i hope to see you guys around the forums because i have a few ????? i still haven\'t made it to the mun yet. talk to you guys later

semper fi,
